segments.text: I think it’s funny how the woman is so focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s standing in a puddle, and she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and she’s completely clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever realize what’s going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is about to fall, and she’s just polishing that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is like a comedy of errors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how unaware she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she’s in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon, or this is going to end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between her calmness and the chaos is just too funny.
segments.speaker: PAR
